total_population.label: Total Population
total_population.description: Displays the total population for each year in the selected period.

cancer_incidence.label: Cancer Incidence
cancer_incidence.description: Shows the number of new cancer cases diagnosed each year.

mortality_rate.label: Mortality Rate
mortality_rate.description: Presents the annual mortality rate due to cancer per 100,000 population.

treatment_costs.label: Treatment Costs
treatment_costs.description: Estimates the total annual costs associated with cancer treatment.

survival_rates.label: 5-Year Survival Rates
survival_rates.description: Displays the percentage of patients surviving 5 years after diagnosis for different cancer types.
